original_text: The rulers in the land hurt people, like strong lions that tear animals in pieces. They use their power to destroy people. They take for themselves riches and valuable things that belong to other people. They have killed many men so that there are now many widows in the land.
korean_text: 그 가운데에서 선지자들의 반역함이 우는 사자가 음식물을 움킴 같았도다 그들이 사람의 영혼을 삼켰으며 재산과 보물을 탈취하며 과부를 그 가운데에 많게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: The rulers in the land hurt people
like strong lions that tear animals in pieces
They use their power to destroy people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 권력을 사용하여 사람들을 파괴합니다

sentences.original_text: They take for themselves riches and valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 부와 가치 있는 물건들을 자신을 위해 가져갑니다

sentences.original_text: so that there are now many widows in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그 땅에는 이제 많은 과부들이 있습니다
